name: Death Jr.
description:
When Death Jr. accidentally releases the evil Necromancer Moloch and his hordes of deranged demon-beasts to wreak havoc on the town, it’s time for some quick-thinking action from the son of the Grim one. Grab your scythe, an arsenal of guns, and your... self-guided C4 hamsters?... to hack, maim and destroy armies of mutant creatures and scavenge the souls of those you so innocently imperiled... and keep yourself out of military school.

• Detailed 3D environments, humorous storytelling and fun characters join Death Jr. in his adventure to avoid getting into trouble.
• Slash enemies, grabble and jump on hard-to-reach platforms utilizing DJ’s iconic scythe.
• Scour overrun demonized locations like Meatworld, the museum, and the horrific... school.
• DJ’s got the moves with crazy scythe combos, special gun attacks and acrobatic aerial maneuvers.

1 Player
Memory Stick Duo™ 448 KB
